title: "transient" and "loadOnStartup" options are not available to the CoreAdmin http api
description: The "transient" and "loadOnStartup" options are not available to the CoreAdmin http api, so one cannot create cores with these attributes.

comments.author: dfdeshom
comments.content: I've attached a patch for this issue

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Thanks both for catching this and the patch! I'm currently working on SOLR-4615, so I'm in the code anyway. I hope to fold this patch into that work in the next day or two and commit...
